attributes.action: Make vaccination mandatory for all MPs and members of the House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details: With crisis after crisis gripping our nation the death or serious illness of an MP or other government officials could deepen the fear felt by the public. Vaccination would reduce the risk of this. This would also show the public the Government are confident in the vaccines.
attributes.background: Bring in Mandatory vaccination for all MPs, Members of the House of Lords and all their staff.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408

Make covid-19 vaccination a requirement for all elected representatives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598503
